retrieve(Choice) - Method in class ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.local.ChoiceManager
Retrieves a choice from the database.

The choice passed into this method is a story holding search criteria, so any field you would like to include in the search, just set the search criteria holding choice to it.

* Example Call.
Choice c = new choice("123ad4", "123de", "d342a", "text");
ChoiceManager chm = ChoiceManager.getInstance(someActivity.this);
chm.insert(c);
To now search for this choice based on its tect:

Choice criteria = new choice(null, null, null, "text");
retrieve(Media) - Method in class ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.local.MediaManager
Retrieves a media from the database.

The media passed into this method is a media holding search criteria, so any field you would like to include in the search, just set the search criteria holding story to it.

Example Call.
Media media = new Media("3242a21d", "/path/", "photo", "hello world");
MediaManager mm = MediaManager.getInstance(someActivity.this);
mm.insert(media);
To now search for this media based on its text:

Media criteria = new Media(null, null, null, null, "hello world");
retrieve(A) - Method in class ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.local.StoringManager
Retrieves an object(s) from the database given an object of the same type holding the desired search criteria.
retrieve(Story) - Method in class ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.local.StoryManager
Retrieves a story /stories from the database.
